metadata.title: CVE-2018-17435 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read in H5O_attr_decode() in H5Oattr.c in the HDFHDF5 through 1.10.3 library allows attackers to cause a denial of servicevia a crafted HDF5 file. This issue was triggered while converting an HDFfile to GIF file.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
